probability_assessment.your_adjusted_view: No adjustments needed; current probabilities reflect the market sentiment accurately.

reasoning: Given the negative expected value and unfavorable risk/reward ratio, it is prudent to avoid any position in META. The high probability of a bearish outcome further supports this decision.
